content: yarn i used flinders 4 seasons for this towel but you can use any brand you like just make sure it s 100% cotton if you like to make a bigger size you ll need more yarn size is adjustable by chaining more or less and the amount of row gauge was calculated by counting the single_crochet stitches within moss stitch chain-1-spaces between the stitches were not counted more information at https //mycrochetspace com/crochet-tea-towel-free-pattern/
